folio_definition_one: ✅ an individual leaf of paper or parchment, either loose as one of a series or forming part of a bound volume, which is numbered on the recto or front side only.
folio_definition_two: ✅ a sheet of paper folded once to form two leaves (four pages) of a book.
folio_includes: Thus, my portfolio design is inspired by the two things I love:
folio_item_colour: 🍀 also, you might've already guessed that <green>green</green> is my favorite color.
